description: Open or import a document from local file system using the standard file browser dialog.

description: Open Save Document dialog for choosing save location, filename, and format. Does not auto-save.

userMessage.success: Save dialog opened. Choose a location and format to save the document.

params.paramDescription: Optional. The file format to suggest in the dialog (e.g., 'JPEG', 'PNG', 'PSD'). If not provided, the current format is used.
